item.description:
Afterwork Mixer this Thursday at the Living Room Boston 101 Atlantic Avenue

For young professionals alike in the heart of Boston's Waterfront District 6:30-9:30pm.

The Afterwork mixer returns this November 13th. This time we are taking the party to the Living Room Lounge near Boston's watefront district.

The Living Room is one of the premier afterwork spots in the Boston area.This is a great spot to relax and lounge out while mingling and getting to know everyone. Thus, if you enjoy making new contacts and friends, while enjoying some of the best cocktails on a wonderful fall evening then this is the event for you!! Also if you are new member and have not been to an afterwork mixer, or have only been to a few events, I highly encourage you to attend and meet many of our wonderful members.

So what better way to come out this Thurs and have a few cocktails with the group as we gear up for another festive weekend in the city!


Meeting details: Check out the venue website at http://www.livingroom... This will give you a better overall sense of the venue and provide pinpoint directions from your destination.

We will meet at the bar area . Like any event, when arriving please be sure to locate the organizer. Please do not hesitate to call or text me upon arrival if you are having trouble finding the group. My picture is on the site under the Assistant Organizer section so I should not be hard to find.
To find the group with ease I highly ENCOURAGE you to attend early as possible. My phone is 617-671-5310. Please make note prior to arriving. Please email me if you have any questions. Look forward to seeing you all there!
Steven

Public Transportation:
Blue Line to Aquarium
Orange Line to State St
Green Line to Govt Center/Haymarket.

Event cost: Free. (However please feel free to grab a beverage for your hard working organizers)
**Note please see the message board regarding meetup/event etiquette**

group.name: The Boston Night Life Meetup Group

item.name: Thirsty Thursday!!! Afterwork Mixer
